snippet: The government is considering contracts with climbing companies that would grant exclusive access to many of its highest mountains, a spokesman for Nepal’s tourism ministry said on Tuesday.
abstract: Nepalese government is considering contracts with climbing companies that would grant exclusive access to many of its highest mountains as part of effort to bring more climbers to Himalayas.
lead_paragraph: The government is considering contracts with climbing companies that would grant exclusive access to many of its highest mountains, a spokesman for Nepal’s tourism ministry said on Tuesday.

headline.main: Nepal: Push to Open Peaks to Climbers
headline.print_headline: Nepal: Push to Open Peaks to Climbers
